title: How to Make Cottage Cheese Wraps

steps.headline: Heat the cottage cheese in a plastic bowl.
steps.description: Stir until creamy. Add a shake of garlic powder and salt. Stir again.

steps.headline: Take out the tortillas.
steps.description: Lay them flat on large plates. Using a spoon, scoop the cottage cheese onto the four tortillas. Spread and distribute evenly.

steps.headline: Lay lettuce leaves over the spread, or shredded lettuce if you desire.
Roll up the tortillas.
steps.description: Be sure to wrap them tightly.

text: Heat the cottage cheese in a plastic bowl. Stir until creamy. Add a shake of garlic powder and salt. Stir again. Take out the tortillas. Lay them flat on large plates. Using a spoon, scoop the cottage cheese onto the four tortillas. Spread and distribute evenly. Lay lettuce leaves over the spread, or shredded lettuce if you desire.  Roll up the tortillas. Be sure to wrap them tightly.
